About Me

Hi, there. I'm a designer who lives in the Philadelphia-area. If you see me around Old City stop and say "hello". Do you use Twitter? Great! Me, too. I'm @chuise. If you would like to chat, drop me a line. You can also find some of my work on Dribbble. Also, I helped make a thing called Streamalong. You should check it out.
